name: tuneefy
description: A new version of [tuneefy](http://tuneefy.com) built for PHP 7, from the ground up, using the minimal Slim framework and a few helper libraries.

scripts.api-documentation: ./node_modules/aglio/bin/aglio.js --theme-full-width --theme-template triple --theme-variables streak --theme-style default --theme-style app/templates/api/api.less --no-theme-condense -i app/templates/api/main.apib -o app/templates/api.html

author: tchap
